data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (cpu_utilization IS NULL OR cpu_utilization < 85.0) AND (fan_error_percentage IS NULL OR fan_error_percentage < 10) AND (memory_utilization IS NULL OR memory_utilization < 90) AND (port_error_percentage IS NULL OR port_error_percentage < 1) AND (power_supplies_in_error_state IS NULL OR power_supplies_in_error_state < 1) AND (power_supply_error_percentage IS NULL OR power_supply_error_percentage < 10) AND (sensor_error_percentage IS NULL OR sensor_error_percentage < 10) AND (sensors_in_error_state IS NULL OR sensors_in_error_state < 1)) AS 'Health Score' FROM cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_switch FACET cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_switch_name
SELECT uniqueCount(cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_switch_name) AS 'Switchs' FROM cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_switch FACET device_type
SELECT uniqueCount(cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_switch_name) AS 'Switchs' FROM cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_switch FACET health_status

presentation.title: Health Status Distribution
presentation.notes: System Health Status for this Switch

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_switch_name) AS 'Switchs' FROM cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_switch FACET system_state
SELECT average(cpu_utilization) FROM cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_switch COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(memory_utilization) FROM cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_switch COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(fan_error_percentage) FROM cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_switch COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Fan Error Percentage (Percent)
presentation.notes: Fan Status In Error Percentage of this Switch

presentation.notes: Port Status In Error Percentage of this Switch

presentation.notes: Power Module Status In Error Count of this Switch
